gallbladder.details: लेप्रोस्कोपिक हर्निया सर्जरी, एक न्यूनतम इनवेसिव दृष्टिकोण, सर्जरी के क्षेत्र में एक गेम-चेंजर बन गई है, जो रोगियों को कई लाभ प्रदान करती है। Medlife Easy में, हम इस अत्याधुनिक तकनीक को बिहार में हर्निया के लिए सुलभ बनाने के लिए पूरी तरह समर्पित हैं।
subLists: दर्दरहित सर्जरी (Painless Surgery) तथा जल्द रिकवरी

aboutDisease.details: Gallbladder stones are characterized by the formation of solid particles within the gallbladder. These stones can vary in size and may cause symptoms such as pain, discomfort, or bloating. In some cases, individuals with gallbladder stones may experience no symptoms at all.

symptomsList: Abdominal pain, particularly in the upper right side
Sudden and intense pain in the upper abdomen, known as biliary colic
Jaundice (yellowing of the skin and eyes)
Fever and chills in cases of infection

diagnosis.details: Gallbladder Stones diagnosis relies on a thorough examination of symptoms, a patient's medical history, and, if necessary, imaging tests. During the examination, the doctor may ask the patient to cough, as this often accentuates the visibility of a hernia.
